F300753315D54E3CB2690712882438A8.description: Construct an introductory level project following guidelines such as: generate different project ideas; plan and manage the project including assessment criteria in consultation with the instructor; plan and use diagrams to guide construction; set a procedural sequence; create a timeline; identify, acquire and use the appropriate materials and parts; interpret and follow directions; adhere to timelines; work cooperatively; follow all safety requirements; follow all handling and storing procedures; fulfill cleanup and tool maintenance responsibilities; and, present the completed project and complete a self-assessment based on the criteria for the project.
